Detailed Description

Wrapper for context manager that provides an interface for implicit users
Author:
Marco Cristo & Angelo Bittar

Definition at line 109 of file ImplicitContextManager.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ImplicitContextManager (  ) 

Get instance of (explicit) presentation context and corresponding context manager. Load users and profiles Set current implicit user profile. Clean up profile base Starts class DataInterface which simulates TV metadata broadcast (test purpose only -- actual DataInterface should only provide access to TV metadata).

~ImplicitContextManager (  ) 

Destructor for implicit context manager
